title: LLR: a latent low-rank approach to colocalizing genetic risk variants in multiple GWAS

Simple Bayesian approaches to modelling.ref_texts: [24] J. Liu, X. Wan, C. Wang, C. Yang, X. Zhou, and C. Yang, “LLR: A latent low-rank approach to colocalizing genetic risk variants in multiple GWAS,” Bioinformatics, Aug. 2017.
Simple Bayesian approaches to modelling.1: This can involve genotyping the region at a denser set of markers [19] or sequencing just the area around the association signal [20], integrating GWAS associations with genome annotations [21], or using statistical methods to model different patterns of causality in the region [22, 23, 24].
